effect.then: Sure. Art is about working and preparing for the marvellous to happen. Don't you just love when the marvellous happens?
I love art, though I'm not sure what defines art.
I want to make art. Art is like cultural technology. I got so many ideas in me I can't sleep.
Sure, I count my self as an art lover, but think the boundary of what defines art is highly flexible, very fuzzy.
